title: Get started
text: INSPIRE Directive aims create European Union spatial data infrastructure purposes EU environmental policies policies activities may impact environment. European Spatial Data Infrastructure enable sharing environmental spatial information among public sector organisations, facilitate public access spatial information across Europe assist policy-making across boundaries. https://knowledge-base.inspire.ec.europa.eu/index_en implementation INSPIRE directive Cadastre Basque Country allows recover spatial objects cadastre databases three provinces (Bizkaia, Gipuzkua Alava): Vector objects: Parcels, addresses, buildings, cadastral zones . objects provided CatastRoEus sf objects (see ?sf::st_sf).

title: Get started
text: example retrieve cadastral parcels Bilbao: Example: Bilbao
code: library(CatastRoEus) # For getting coords library(sf) library(mapSpain) # Data wrangling and visualization library(dplyr) library(ggplot2)  bilbao <- esp_get_capimun(munic = "Bilbao") %>%   st_transform(4326) %>%   # Small buffer of 200 m   st_buffer(200)  cp_bilbao <- catreus_wfs_get_parcels_bbox(bilbao)  ggplot(cp_bilbao) +   geom_sf()

title: Get started
text: can create also thematic maps using information available spatial objects. produce visualization urban growth Donostia using CatastRoEus, replicating map produced Dominic Royé post Visualize urban growth. first place, extract coordinates city center Donostia using mapSpain: Next step consists extracting buildings using WFS service: Next step creating visualization crop buildings buffer created : Buildings Map Let’s extract now finishing construction year, available column end: Last step create groups based year create data visualization. use function ggplot2::cut_width() create different classes: Donostia: Urban Growth
code: # Use mapSpain for getting the coords donostia <- esp_get_capimun(munic = "^Donostia")  # Transform to ETRS89 / UTM 30 N and add a buffer of 750m  donostia_buff <- donostia %>%   st_transform(4326) %>%   st_buffer(1250) donostia_bu <- catreus_wfs_get_buildings_bbox(donostia_buff, count = 1000) if (st_crs(donostia_bu) != st_crs(donostia_buff)) {   donostia_buff <- st_transform(donostia_buff, st_crs(donostia_bu)) }  dataviz <- st_intersection(donostia_bu, donostia_buff)  ggplot(dataviz) +   geom_sf() # Extract 4 initial positions year <- substr(dataviz$end, 1, 4)  # Replace all that doesn't look as a number with 0000 year[!(year %in% 0:2500)] <- "0000"  # To numeric year <- as.integer(year)  # New column dataviz <- dataviz %>%   mutate(year = year) dataviz <- dataviz %>%   mutate(year_cat = ggplot2::cut_width(year, width = 10, dig.lab = 12))  #Personalise palette color  dataviz_pal <- c(   "#FF0000", "#FF7F00", "#FFFF00", "#7FFF00", "#00FF00",    "#00FF7F", "#00FFFF", "#007FFF", "#0000FF", "#7F00FF",    "#FF00FF", "#FF007F", "#7F0000", "#7F3F00", "#7F7F00",    "#3F7F00", "#007F00", "#007F3F", "#007F7F", "#003F7F",    "#00007F", "#3F007F", "#7F007F", "#7F003F", "#4B0082",   "#9400D3", "#8B4513", "#D2691E", "#FF4500" )  ggplot(dataviz) +   geom_sf(aes(fill = year_cat), color = NA) +   scale_fill_manual(values = dataviz_pal, guide = guide_legend(ncol = 2)) +   theme_void() +   labs(title = "DONOSTIA", fill = "") +   theme(     panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black"),     plot.background = element_rect(fill = "black"),     legend.justification = .5,     legend.text = element_text(       colour = "white",       size = 12     ),     plot.title = element_text(       colour = "white", hjust = .5,       margin = margin(t = 30),       size = 30     ),     plot.caption = element_text(       colour = "white",       margin = margin(b = 20), hjust = .5     ),     plot.margin = margin(r = 40, l = 40)   )

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jimena Salinero. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Salinero J (2024). CatastRoEus: Interface API Catastro Pais Vasco. doi:10.5281/zenodo.6366407, https://github.com/rOpenSpain/CatastRoEus.
code: @Manual{R-catastroeus,   title = {{CatastRoEus}: Interface to the {API} {Catastro} of {Pais Vasco}},   author = {Jimena Salinero},   year = {2024},   version = {0.0.0.9000},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.6366407},   url = {https://github.com/rOpenSpain/CatastRoEus},   abstract = {Access public spatial data available under the INSPIRE directive. Tools for downloading references, buildings and addresses of properties on Pais Vasco (Spain).}, }

text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(CatastRoEus) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
title: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
text: Use function caution. function clear cached data configuration, specifically: Deletes CatastRoEus config directory (rappdirs::user_config_dir("CatastRoEus", "R")). Deletes cache_dir directory. Deletes values stored Sys.getenv("CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR").

title: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
code: catreus_clear_cache(config = FALSE, cached_data = TRUE, verbose = FALSE)

title: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
text: config TRUE, delete configuration folder CatastRoEus. cached_data set TRUE, delete cache_dir content. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
text: Invisible. function called side effects.

title: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
text: overkill function intended reset status never installed /used CatastRoEus.

title: Clear your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_clear_cache
code: # Don't run this! It would modify your current state # \dontrun{ catreus_clear_cache(verbose = TRUE) #> CatastRoEus cached data deleted: C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpyM04Jf/CatastRoEus # }  Sys.getenv("CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR") #> [1] ""

what: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
title: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
text: function store cache_dir path local machine load future sessions. Type Sys.getenv("CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR") find cached path. Alternatively, can store cache_dir manually following options: Run Sys.setenv(CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR = "cache_dir"). need run command session (Similar install = FALSE). Write line .Renviron file: CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR = "value_for_cache_dir" (behavior install = TRUE). store cache_dir permanently.

title: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
code: catreus_set_cache_dir(   cache_dir,   overwrite = FALSE,   install = FALSE,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
text: cache_dir path cache directory. missing value function store cached files temporary dir (See base::tempdir()). overwrite set TRUE, overwrite existing CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR already local machine. install TRUE, install key local machine use future sessions.  Defaults FALSE. cache_dir FALSE parameter set FALSE automatically. verbose Logical, displays information. Useful debugging, default FALSE.

title: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
text: (invisible) character path cache_dir.

title: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
text: Sometimes cached files may corrupt. case, try re-downloading data setting update_cache = TRUE. experience problem download, try download corresponding file method save cache_dir. Use option verbose = TRUE debugging API query.

title: Set your CatastRoEus cache dir — catreus_set_cache_dir
code: # Don't run this! It would modify your current state # \dontrun{ catreus_set_cache_dir(verbose = TRUE) #> Using a temporary cache dir. Set 'cache_dir' to a value for store permanently #> CatastRoEus cache dir is: C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpyM04Jf/CatastRoEus # }  Sys.getenv("CATASTROEUS_CACHE_DIR") #> [1] "C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpyM04Jf/CatastRoEus"

what: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox
title: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox
text: function fetches addresses data within specified bounding box. first checks provided coordinates valid, determines province based coordinates using reverse geocoding, fetches address data Bizkaia Gipuzkoa accordingly. supports transformations geographical UTM coordinate systems, handles multiple Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS), manages different minimum counts returned records.

title: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox
code: catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox(x, srs = NULL, verbose = FALSE, count = NULL)

title: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox
text: x Bounding box coordinates spatial object, : numeric vector length 4 coordinates defining bounding box: c(latitude1, longitude1, latitude2, longitude2). sf/sfc object sf package. srs Spatial Reference System (SRS) Coordinate Reference System (CRS) code used query. best results, ensure coordinates ETRS89 (EPSG:25830) WGS84 (EPSG:4326) using latitude longitude. verbose Logical; TRUE, additional information function operations printed. Useful debugging. Default FALSE. count Integer specifying maximum number address records return, NULL use default settings API service.

title: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox
text: Depending input geographic location, function may return: message detailing success query province fetched. warning message bounding box spans multiple provinces. error message coordinates within Pais Vasco.

title: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox
text: function uses reverse geocoding determine province within Basque Country coordinates provided. Based province, delegates data fetching specific functions handling province's data. supports flexible input types handles geographical coordinate transformations internally needed.

title: Retrieve Address Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_address_bbox

title: Retrieve Building Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_buildings_bbox
code: # \donttest{  library(mapSpain) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.12.1, GDAL 3.8.4, PROJ 9.3.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE  # Define bounding box coordinates for a location in Gipuzkoa coords_gipuzkoa <- c(580335.961264, 4795197.149650, 581482.214894, 4795985.065492)  # Fetch building data using the bounding box buildings_gipuzkoa <- catreus_wfs_get_buildings_bbox(coords_gipuzkoa, srs = 25830, count = 10) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Province of Gipuzkoa:" #> [1] "-------------------------------"  library(ggplot2) # Plot the buildings data ggplot(buildings_gipuzkoa) +   geom_sf() +   ggtitle("Building Data for Gipuzkoa")   # Define bounding box coordinates for a location in Bizkaia bilbao <- esp_get_capimun(munic = "Bilbao") %>%   st_transform(25830) %>%   st_buffer(300) buildings_bilbao <- catreus_wfs_get_buildings_bbox(bilbao) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Province of Bizkaia:" #> [1] "-------------------------------" #> Warning: incomplete final line found on 'C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpyM04Jf/file8ec676e7797.gml' #> Warning: GDAL Message 1: Field with same name (identifier) already exists in (Building). Skipping newer ones #> Warning: GDAL Message 1: Field with same name (identifier) already exists in (Building). Skipping newer ones ggplot(buildings_bilbao) +   geom_sf() +   ggtitle("Buildings Data for Bilbao")   # Define bounding box coordinates for a rural location in Araba/Álava coords_alaba <- c(525858.205755, 4742911.412803, 526701.543389, 4743398.976145)  # Fetch building data using the bounding box, requesting more features buildings_alaba <- catreus_wfs_get_buildings_bbox(coords_alaba, srs = 25830) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Province of Araba/Álava:" #> [1] "-------------------------------"  library(ggplot2) # Plot the buildings data for Araba/Álava ggplot(buildings_alaba) +   geom_sf() +   ggtitle("Building Data for Alaba")  # }

title: Retrieve Parcel Data in Pais Vasco Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wfs_get_parcels_bbox
code: # \donttest{  library(mapSpain) library(dplyr) library(sf)  # Define bounding box coordinates for an urban location in Gipuzkoa coords_gipuzkoa <- c(582745.070132, 4795611.169048, 584249.337348, 4796830.604835)  # Fetch parcel data using the bounding box parcels_gipuzkoa <- catreus_wfs_get_parcels_bbox(coords_gipuzkoa, srs = 25830) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Province of Gipuzkoa:" #> [1] "-------------------------------"  library(ggplot2) # Plot the parcels data ggplot(parcels_gipuzkoa) +   geom_sf() +   ggtitle("Parcels Data for Gipuzkoa")   # Define bounding box coordinates for a location in Bizkaia coords_bizkaia <- c(504218.816311, 4788948.595082, 505374.746026, 4789719.963173)  # Fetch parcel data using the bounding box parcels_bizkaia <- catreus_wfs_get_parcels_bbox(coords_bizkaia, srs = 25830) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Province of Bizkaia:" #> [1] "-------------------------------" #> Warning: incomplete final line found on 'C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpyM04Jf/file8ec5d442bb8.gml' #> Warning: GDAL Message 1: Field with same name (identifier) already exists in (CadastralParcel). Skipping newer ones #> Warning: GDAL Message 1: Field with same name (identifier) already exists in (CadastralParcel). Skipping newer ones  library(ggplot2) # Plot the parcels data for Bizkaia ggplot(parcels_bizkaia) +   geom_sf() +   ggtitle("Parcels Data for Bizkaia")   # Define bounding box coordinates for a location in Araba   # Fetch parcel data using the bounding box vitoria <- esp_get_capimun(munic = "Vitoria") %>%   st_transform(4326) %>%   # Small buffer of 200 m   st_buffer(300)  parcels_araba <- catreus_wfs_get_parcels_bbox(vitoria) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Province of Araba/Álava:" #> [1] "-------------------------------" ggplot(parcels_araba) +   geom_sf() +   ggtitle("Parcels Data for Vitoria")  # }

what: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
title: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
text: Fetches geotagged images Cadastre based provided bounding box coordinates. function determines province (Bizkaia, Gipuzkoa, Araba/Álava) using reverse geocoding fetches appropriate data using specific WMS service functions province. ensures coordinates fall within single province handles different CRS inputs.

title: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
code: catreus_wms_get_layer(   x,   srs = NULL,   what = c("parcel", "admunit", "admbound", "building", "zoning", "address", "buother"),   id = "change_id",   styles = NULL,   verbose = FALSE,   crop = FALSE,   options = list() )

title: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
text: x numeric vector bbox coordinates sf object defining area covered. numeric vector length 4 coordinates defining bounding box: c(xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax). srs spatial reference system used, typically EPSG code (3857 25830). Specifies layer extracted. Options include: Bizkaia: "parcel": CP.CadastralParcel "zoning": CP.CadastralZoning "address": AD.Address "admunit": AU.AdministrativeUnit Gipuzkoa: "parcel": cp.CadastralParcel "zoning": cp.CadastralZoning "address": ad.Address "admunit": au.AdministrativeUnit "admbound": au.AdministrativeBoundary "building": bu.building "buother": bu.otherconstruction Araba: "parcel": CP.CadastralParcel "admunit": AU.AdministrativeUnit "admbound": AU.AdministrativeBoundary "building": BU.Building id identifier custom WMS service configuration. styles Specifies style WMS layer, see Styles options. verbose Logical; TRUE, prints additional information function operations. Useful debugging. Default FALSE. crop Logical; TRUE, returned image cropped bbox. Default FALSE. options List; additional options WMS request.

title: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
text: Returns SpatRaster object either RGB RGBA layers depending data. Additionally, prints messages detailing province detected potential issues provided coordinates.

title: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
text: Various styles available layer, can enhance visualization: Bizkaia: "parcel": "CP.CadastralParcel.BoundariesOnly", "CP.CadastralParcel.ReferencePointOnly", "CP.CadastralParcel.LabelOnReferencePoint", "CP.CadastralParcel.Default", "inspire_common:DEFAULT" "zoning": "CP.CadastralZoning.Default", "inspire_common:DEFAULT" "address": "AD.Address.Default", "inspire_common:DEFAULT" "admunit": "AU.AdministrativeUnit.Default", "inspire_common:DEFAULT" Gipuzkoa: "parcel": "CP.CadastralParcel.BoundariesOnly", "CP.CadastralParcel.ReferencePointOnly", "CP.CadastralParcel.LabelOnReferencePoint", "CP.CadastralParcel.Default", "CP.CadastralParcel.ELFCadastre" "zoning": "CP.CadastralZoning.Default", "CP.CadastralZoning.ELFCadastre" "address": "AD.Address.Default", "AD.Address.Number.ELFCadastre" "admunit": "AU.AdministrativeUnit.Default", "AU.AdministrativeUnit.ELFCadastre" "admbound": "AU.AdministrativeBoundary.Default", "AU.AdministrativeBoundary.ELFCadastre" "building": "BU.Building.Default", "BU.Building.ELFCadastre" "buother": "BU.OtherConstruction.Default","BU.OtherConstruction.ELFCadastre" Araba: "parcel": "INSPIRE_CP:CP.CadastralParcel.Default", "INSPIRE_CP:CP.CadastralParcel.ELFCadastre", "INSPIRE_CP:CP.CadastralParcel.BoundariesOnly", "INSPIRE_CP:CP.CadastralParcel.LabelOnReferencePoint", "INSPIRE_CP:CP.CadastralParcel.ReferencePointOnly" "admunit": "INSPIRE_AU:AU.AdministrativeUnit.Default" "admbound": "INSPIRE_AU:AU.AdministrativeBoundary.Default" "building": "INSPIRE_BU:BU.Building.Default"

title: WMS INSPIRE: Retrieve Map Images from the Basque Country (Pais Vasco) Based on Bounding Box Coordinates — catreus_wms_get_layer
code: # \donttest{ library(mapSpain) library(ggplot2) library(terra) #> terra 1.7.78 library(tidyterra) #>  #> Attaching package: 'tidyterra' #> The following object is masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter  # Fetching a building layer using specific bounding box coordinates (Araba) pic_bu <- catreus_wms_get_layer(c(-298730.238481, 5288011.551711, -296360.690604, 5289922.477418),   srs = 3857, what = "building", id = "layer_eus_1" ) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1.3 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Coordinates of Araba/Álava:" #> [1] "building"  # Displaying the fetched raster image ggplot() +   geom_spatraster_rgb(data = pic_bu)   # Fetching an address layer using specific bounding box coordinates (Gipuzkoa) pic_ad <- catreus_wms_get_layer(c(-221868.029226, 5358914.061417, -220750.137688, 5360872.760267),   srs = 3857, what = "address", id = "layer_eus_2" ) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Coordinates of Gipuzkoa:" #> [1] "address" #> Warning: URL 'https://b5m.gipuzkoa.eus/inspire/wms/gipuzkoa_wms?request=GetMap&service=WMS&format=image/png&layers=ad.Address&styles=default&version=1.3.0&crs=EPSG:3857&bbox=-222337.40035325,5358865.09394575,-220280.76656075,5360921.72773825&width=512&height=512': status was 'Failure when receiving data from the peer' #> Error in download.file(url = q, destfile = filename, mode = "wb", quiet = !verbose): download from 'https://b5m.gipuzkoa.eus/inspire/wms/gipuzkoa_wms?request=GetMap&service=WMS&format=image/png&layers=ad.Address&styles=default&version=1.3.0&crs=EPSG:3857&bbox=-222337.40035325,5358865.09394575,-220280.76656075,5360921.72773825&width=512&height=512' failed  # Displaying the fetched raster image ggplot() +   geom_spatraster_rgb(data = pic_ad) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'pic_ad' not found  # Fetching a zoning layer using specific bounding box coordinates (Bizkaia) pic_zo <- catreus_wms_get_layer(c(-339724.372213, 5356554.068169, -333915.158064, 5361598.912035),   srs = 3857, what = "zoning", id = "layer_eus_3" ) #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> Passing 1 coordinate to the Nominatim single coordinate geocoder #> Query completed in: 1 seconds #> [1] "Coordinates of Bizkaia:" #> [1] "zoning"  # Displaying the fetched raster image ggplot() +   geom_spatraster_rgb(data = pic_zo)  # }
